welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salt Lake City, where the stunning mountains meet vibrant urban life. Enjoy our famous outdoor activities, rich history, and friendly locals as you explore all the city has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is a fried chicken joint located in Kolkata.
restaurants.address: Diamond Plaza Mall, Kolkata 700055, West Bengal

restaurants.name: Aminia
restaurants.description: Aminia is a indian restaurant located in Kolkata.

restaurants.name: The Darjeeling
restaurants.description: The Darjeeling is a tibetan restaurant located in Kolkata.
restaurants.address: DD 28, Gorkha Bhawan, Sector 1, Salt Lake, Kolkata 700064, West Bengal

restaurants.name: WOW Momo
restaurants.description: WOW Momo is a dumpling restaurant located in Kolkata.

restaurants.name: Hide Cafe

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, mainly serving Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
